IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROMOTE AND ENHANCE THE PROFESSION OF BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY THROUGH EDUCATIONAL MEETINGS AND SCIENTIFIC PUBLICATIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE SOCIETY OF BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY IS TO: 1. PROMOTE EXCELLENCE IN RESEARCH INVESTIGATING THE NATURE, CAUSES, MECHANISMS, AND TREATMENTS OF DISORDERS OF THOUGHT, EMOTION, AND BEHAVIOR.2. FOSTER DEVELOPMENT OF INVESTIGATORS IN PSYCHIATRY.3. EDUCATE YOUNG SCIENTISTS AND CLINICIANS ABOUT THE BIOLOGICAL UNDERPINNINGS OF PSYCHIATRIC DISORDERS MORE GENERALLY.4. DISSEMINATE THE HIGHEST QUALITY KNOWLEDGE REGARDING THE SCIENTIFIC BASIS OF PSYCHIATRY.
IRS990.Desc: ANNUAL MEETING: THE SOCIETY MEETS ANNUALLY TO CONDUCT AN EDUCATIONAL MEETING AND TO HONOR OUTSTANDING MEMBERS. THESE ACTIVITIES ARE INTENDED TO PROMOTE AND ENHANCE THE PROFESSION OF BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: BP AND CNNI JOURNAL: THE SOCIETY SOLICITS AND PUBLISHES ARTICLES TO PROMOTE AND ENHANCE THE PROFESSION OF BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY.BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY: GLOBAL OPEN SCIENCE IS AN OFFICIAL JOURNAL OF THE SOCIETY OF BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY FAMILY OF JOURNALS. THIS OPEN-ACCESS, PEER-REVIEWED, RAPID-PUBLICATION, INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL PROMOTES OPEN DISSEMINATION OF RESEARCH BY PUBLISHING BASIC, TRANSLATIONAL, AND CLINICAL CONTRIBUTIONS FROM SCIENTISTS ACROSS THE WORLD IN ALL DISCIPLINES, RESEARCH AREAS, AND RESEARCH METHODS RELEVANT TO THE PATHOPHYSIOLOGY AND TREATMENT OF MAJOR PSYCHIATRIC DISORDERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GAAP REQUIRES ENTITIES TO EVALUATE, MEASURE, RECOGNIZE AND DISCLOSE ANY UNCERTAIN INCOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ON THEIR TAX RETURNS. GAAP PRESCRIBES A MINIMUM THRESHOLD THAT A TAX POSITION IS REQUIRED TO MEET IN ORDER TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE SOCIETY BELIEVES THAT IT HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS DEFINED IN GAAP.

ForeignIndividualsGrantsGrp.RegionTxt: EUROPE (INCLUDING ICELAND & GREENLAND) - ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, BELGIU

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO MONITORING OF THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS IS REQUIRED.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: RESEARCH AND SUPPORT OF THE NATIONAL NEUROSCIENCE CURRICULUM INITIATIVE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO MONITORING OF THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS IS REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HIRED PARTHENON MANAGEMENT GROUP TO MANAGE SOCIETY BUSINESS, FINANCES, MEMBERSHIP AND ORGANIZE FUTURE ANNUAL MEETINGS. THE MANAGEMENT COMPANY OVERSEAS DAY TO DAY OPERATIONS OF THE SOCIETY, AND CONSULTS WITH THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND SOCIETY OFFICERS WHO MAKE DECISIONS REGARDING THE SOCIETY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REGULAR MEMBERS ARE THOSE WHO ARE RESEARCHERS OR CLINICIANS IN BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY WITH A MINIMUM OF FIVE PUBLICATIONS IN THE FIELD. ASSOCIATE MEMBERS ARE THOSE WHO ARE RESEARCHERS OR CLINICIANS IN BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY WITH LESS THAN FIVE PUBLICATIONS IN THE FIELD. STUDENT MEMBERS ARE THOSE CURRENTLY ENROLLED IN ANY AUTHORIZED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM, FULL-TIME TRAINING, AT DEGREE-GRANTING INSTITUTION (UNDERGRADUATE, GRADUATE, MEDICAL STUDENT, RESIDENT, FELLOW) WHO HAVE AN INTEREST IN BIOLOGICAL PSYCHIATRY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REGULAR MEMBERS AND ASSOCIATE MEMBERS HAVE THE POWER TO ELECT MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGES TO THE BY-LAWS ARE DECIDED BY THE REGULAR MEMBERS AND ASSOCIATE MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FULL BOARD VIA EMAIL AND AT THE DECEMBER ANNUAL BOARD COMITTEE MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOCIETY'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. EACH COUNCILOR SHALL ANNUALLY COMPLETE A DISCLOSURE FORM IDENTIFYING ANY RELATIONSHIPS, POSITIONS, OR CIRCUMSTANCES IN WHICH THEY ARE INVOLVED THAT IS BELIEVED COULD CONTRIBUTE TO A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ARISING. IN THE EVENT THAT A CONFLICT IS IDENTIFIED, THE COUNCIL WILL BE NOTIFIED TO REVIEW AND ASSESS THE CASE AND PROCEED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE SOCIETY'S POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOCIETY MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: REASON FOR AMENDED RETURN AND LIST OF CHANGES
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURN IS BEING AMENDED TO CORRECT THE BOARD LIST TO REFLECT THE ACTUAL AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK DURING THE FILING YEAR. FORM 990 PART VII HAS BEEN AMENDED TO UPDATE THE AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK FOR SCOTT RAUCH FROM FIVE AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK TO TWO AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK.
